uri.title: MongoDB connection URI
uri.description: Connection URI used to connect to a MongoDB instance.

host.title: MongoDB connection host
host.description: Not required if the MongoDB connection URI is set.

port.title: MongoDB connection port
port.description: Not required if the MongoDB connection URI is set.

enableCredentials.title: Secure access to MongoDB
enableCredentials.description: If MongoDB database need an authentication, this flag must be enabled.

database.title: The database used to run query
database.description: The MongoDB database used to run query to search for users.

usersCollection.title: The collection used to run query
usersCollection.description: The collection which is containing all the users.

findUserByUsernameQuery.title: Query to find for a user using its identifier (username)
findUserByUsernameQuery.description: The query which is executed to search for an user using its identifier (username).

findUserByMultipleFieldsQuery.title: Query to find for a user using multiple fields (username or email)
findUserByMultipleFieldsQuery.description: The query which is executed to search for an user using its identifier (username) or another field (email). If this field isn't specified, the findUserByUsernameQuery is used

findUserByEmailQuery.title: Query to find for a user using its email
findUserByEmailQuery.description: The query which is executed to search for an user using its email.

usernameField.title: Username field
usernameField.description: The user username field (must be in the same collection as the users).

passwordField.title: Password field
passwordField.description: The user password field (must be in the same collection as the users).

passwordEncoder.title: Password encoder
passwordEncoder.description: The encoding mechanism to store password value.

passwordEncoding.title: Password binary-to-text encoding
passwordEncoding.description: This property will cause the encoded pass to be returned as encoding text representation

useDedicatedSalt.title: Separate salt from the password value ?

passwordSaltAttribute.title: User password salt attribute
passwordSaltAttribute.description: Password salt field of your users if any

passwordSaltLength.title: User password salt length in bytes

userProvider.title: Allow CRUD operations
userProvider.description: When enable, the user profile provided by the identity provider can be managed (CRUD operations)

usernameCaseSensitive.title: Handle username with sensitive case
usernameCaseSensitive.description: The case of the username to create, authenticate and search for the user (applies both to findUserByUsername and findUserByMultipleFields). Default is false
